rukus.text: kaafiro ne kaha ke kya jab hum mitthi ho jayenge aur hamaare baap dada bhi, kya hum phir nikaale jayenge
hum aur hamaare baap dadaao ko bahuth pehle se ye waade kiye jaate rahe, kuch nahi ye to sirf aglo ke afsaane hai
keh dijiye ke zameen mein chal phir kar zara dekho to sahih, ke gunehgaaro ka kaisa anjaam hoa
aap un ke baare mein gham na kare aur un ke daao ghaath se tang dil na ho
kehte hai ke ye waada kabh hai, agar sacche ho to bathla do
jawaab di jiye! ke shaayad baaz wo cheeze jin ki tum jaldi macha rahe ho, tum se bahuth hee qareeb ho gayi ho
yaqinan aap ka parvardigaar tamaam logo par bade hee fazl wala hai, lekin aksar log na shukri karte hai
beshak aap ka rab un chizo ko bhi jaanta hai, jinhe un ke sine chupa rahe hai aur jinhe zaaher kar rahe hai
asmaan wa zameen ki koyi pushida cheez bhi aisi nahi jo roushan aur khuli kitaab mein na ho
yaqinan Qur’aan bani israel ke saamne un aksar chizo ka bayaan kar raha hai, jin mein ye eqtelaaf karte hai
aur ye Qur’aan imaan waalo ke liye yaqinan hidaayath aur rehmath hai
aap ka rab un ke darmiyaan apne hukm se sab faisle kar dega, wo bada hee ghaalib aur daana hai
pas aap yaqinan Allah hee par bharosa rakhiye, yaqinan aap sacche aur khule deen par hai
beshak aap na murdo ko suna sakte hai aur na behro ko apni pukaar suna sakte hai jab ke wo peet phere ru garda ja rahe ho
aur na aap andho ko un ki gumraahi se hata kar rehnumaayi kar sakte hai, aap to sirf unhe suna sakte hai jo hamaari aayato par imaan laaye hai, phir wo farma bardaar ho jaate hai
jab un ke upar azaab ka waada saabith ho jayega, hum zameen se un ke liye ek jaanwar nikaalenge jo un se baatien karta hoga, ke log hamaari aayato par yaqeen nahi karte thein
